com.ronny.ludo
Class LudoActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.ronny.ludo.LudoActivity

public class LudoActivity
extends Activity

Copyright: (c) 2011 Ronny Heitmann Andersen, Ronny Øvereng and Karl-Erik Moberg The main Ludo game activity. This class implements some control of the game and game logic. Other game behavior is done in the LudoSurfaceView
